devdoc.details: Flow VRF implementation using Flow's native secure randomness Implements the IVRF interface for compatibility with DealOrNot contract

canFulfillRequest(uint256).details: This method checks if a request can be fulfilled.

params.requestId: The ID of the randomness request to check.

returns._0: canFulfill Whether the request can be fulfilled.

getRandomNumber(uint256).details: Get the random number for a request

params.requestId: The request ID returned by requestRandomNumber

returns._0: The random number from Flow's VRF

requestRandomNumber(bytes32).details: Request a random number using Flow's native VRF

params._userRandomNumber: Additional entropy from user (can be used for extra randomness)

returns._0: requestId The unique identifier for this random number request
